com.github.dm.jrt.android

Class JRoutineAndroidCompat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channels
      • com.github.dm.jrt.android.channel.AndroidChannels
        • com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.channel.SparseChannelsCompat
          • com.github.dm.jrt.android.JRoutineAndroidCompat

  • public class JRoutineAndroidCompat
extends com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.channel.SparseChannelsCompat
    Class acting as a façade of all the JRoutine library features, with support for the Android compatibility library.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 03/06/2016.
